message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. However, I am only able to commit to a maximum of $12000 for the item. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
